dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Mazhilis just passed that amnesty law tied to the 30th anniversary of Kazakhstan's Constitution.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Mazhilis just passed that amnesty law tied to the thirtieth anniversary of Kazakhstan's Constitution.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Deputies of the Mazhilis have passed the law "On Amnesty in Connection with the 30th Anniversary of the Constitution of the Republic of Kazakhstan."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one President Tokayev directed back in April. It's, uh, pretty broad in scope.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one President Tokayev directed back in April. It's, uh, pretty broad in scope.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The document was developed following a directive from the President, announced in April 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it covers closing cases for minor and medium crimes even before a verdict, which is huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it covers closing cases for minor and medium crimes even before a verdict, which is huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The law also proposes to close criminal cases for minor and medium-gravity crimes committed before the law comes into force, even if the court has not yet issued a verdict.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And for serious offenses, they're still getting sentence reductions, but with conditions—like compensating for fraud or embezzlement damages.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for serious offenses, they're still getting sentence reductions, but with conditions-like compensating for fraud or embezzlement damages.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It also provides for reduced sentences for those convicted of serious and especially serious crimes. For those convicted of fraud or embezzlement of large sums, the sentence will be reduced by one-fifth if the damage has been fully compensated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Deputy Abzal Kuspan mentioned around 15,000 people are affected total.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deputy Abzal Kuspan mentioned around fifteen thousand people are affected total.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mazhilis deputy Abzal Kuspan, 6,000 convicts currently held in prisons and 9,000 individuals under probation supervision fall under the amnesty. "A total of 15,000 people will be affected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a significant number. He said 6,000 in prisons and 9,000 on probation, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a significant number. He said six thousand in prisons and nine thousand on probation, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mazhilis deputy Abzal Kuspan, 6,000 convicts currently held in prisons and 9,000 individuals under probation supervision fall under the amnesty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And about 632 will be released from correctional facilities immediately.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And about six hundred thirty two will be released from correctional facilities immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "About 632 individuals will be released from correctional institutions, along with 3,500 convicts under probation " in total, 4,100 people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus another 3,500 under probation supervision, so over 4,000 walking free.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus another three thousand, five hundred under probation supervision, so over four thousand walking free.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "About 632 individuals will be released from correctional institutions, along with 3,500 convicts under probation " in total, 4,100 people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then differentiated reductions for 11,000 others. It's a massive decongestion effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then differentiated reductions for eleven thousand others. It's a massive decongestion effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A differentiated sentence reduction will be applied to 11,000 individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They emphasized it won't require extra budget funds, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They emphasized it won't require extra budget funds, which is interesting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the authors, the implementation of the law will reduce the number of prisoners, will not require budget expenditures, and will not cause negative consequences.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they had input from so many groups—Ministry of Internal Affairs, prosecutors, NGOs…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they had input from so many groups-Ministry of Internal Affairs, prosecutors, NGOs...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Discussions included representatives from the Ministry of Internal Affairs, Prosecutor General's Office, Ministry of Justice, judges, military, NGOs, and other government agencies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seems like they really tried to cover all angles. Even specific provisions for women—over 800 are included.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seems like they really tried to cover all angles. Even specific provisions for women-over eight hundred are included.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bill also covers 833 women, of whom 109 will be released and 724 will receive reduced sentences," said Kuspan during the plenary session of the Mazhilis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: 109 of them getting released, which is a good step. Hopefully it plays out as intended.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: one hundred nine of them getting released, which is a good step. Hopefully it plays out as intended.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The bill also covers 833 women, of whom 109 will be released and 724 will receive reduced sentences," said Kuspan during the plenary session of the Mazhilis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Fingers crossed. Reducing the prison population without negative consequences is a bold claim.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fingers crossed. Reducing the prison population without negative consequences is a bold claim.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the authors, the implementation of the law will reduce the number of prisoners, will not require budget expenditures, and will not cause negative consequences.
